text: Spelling and, if you can’t format a web page to get your fonts to line up , people probably won’t buy your coin. Just sayin. # masternodes

The rule of 3 is tacky but not enough for text readability which more complex that just that. (4) Font family - imagine web page written in ComicSans (excusez le mot!), Zapf Chancery or Times. (5) short columns - people won't read through lines that extend to1000+ px
I'm all for a fancy high-falutin design of a web page on occasion but sometimes just a line-length-friendly column of text in a nice font is all you need.
FONT LINE COLLECTION! The best PU and amazing shapes! Available on our web page http://www.didaks.com https://www.instagram.com/p/BJKf1wiB7Kj/
@ netmag max number of fonts on a web page? Are fonts with lots of line-weight variation still the way to go for noobs?
